item.title: MCKESSON CORP 10-K
item.description: MCKESSON CORP, which is in the Wholesale-Drugs Proprietaries & Druggists' Sundries [5122] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 12, 2021 had 53802 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 745 instances 2021 - 520 instances financial - 492 instances million - 487 instances 2020 - 479 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
